Perceptor:


Perceptor started to move undergrond towards Kaiser, suddenly he pop 
up and took his Tank's mode "Kaiser, Right here!!"

He aimed his cannons towards Kaiser and shot  minutes later.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Kaiser::
>        As the first shot slams into his shoulder he grimaces and 
allows it to 
> throw him into a shoulder roll.  Mid-roll he resheathes his 
scimitars and 
> draws both of his heavy blasters.  He finishes his roll in a 
crouch and 
> launches a pair of shots at each of the five rogues.
